The claim was published on the website h: com, which was archived for verification purposes.
The article quoted Dr: Matiang’i as urging the public not to repay loans to five specific companies, namely Branch, Tala, Opesa, Okash, and Zenka, due to their alleged illegal operations.
The claim was shared more than 150 times: according to the analysis tool CrowdTangle. Similar claims were also published on other websites.
The spokesperson for Dr: Matiang’i's ministry, Wangui Muchiri, denied that any such order had been made by the minister.
